Contributor: David Allen & Sons, printer.; Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee, publisher.;
Note: Date based on dates of 1st World War. "Poster No. 149." Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to single men that March 1st is the last day for voluntary enlistment. No pictorial content.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Series: Poster (Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee) ; no. 149.

Title: Last day March 1
